subject: Question about upgrading pedals
description_text:
Can Simsonn Pro Plus pedals be upgraded to the Plus X brake? I’m wondering if it is possible to get the bracket or plate or whatever it is that is holding the hydraulic cylinder on the Plus X set. If it is possible, can you tell me what I would need to order? Thanks!

Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Christie Cook, The Pro Plus pedals can be upgraded with a kit and control unit to achieve performance very close to the PlusX pedals. Upgrade link:       https://www.simsonn.com/products/plus-ultra-upgrade-kit?variant=51087403843898     https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
